name: Idle Gamble
description:
Idle Gamble!

Roll The Dice and test your luck in this Idle Gambling Game!

Simply buy more hands/tables in the Idle Gamble Casino and increase your money

Keep your eye on the graph to see your money go up and down in realtime!

Game Created by BoltactionToaster & Lascif

Comments and requests are welcome!
We try to read and response to every comment. We will also do our best to review other peoples submissions

Any sounds and graphics used are either created by us or Public Domain/Copyright Free.

Whilst we have created a gambling simulating game we do not condone gambling nor advise people to gamble real money. 

KNOWN BUGS

The text is slightly sharp when in windowed mode. Fullscreen fixes this issue.

Only the buy button works when you try to buy tables, the rest of the "button" looking object isn't clickable as of yet.

Saving has not been implemented as this is just a proof of concept.

If you don't bet for long at the start the graph may disappear.
